description:
It's here! The big concert! Kasumi Toyama, the girl who followed the trail of golden stars and heard the call of the Star Beat, and her friends/bandmates Saya, Tae, Rimi and Arisa, are now poised on the edge of stardom themselves as they prepare for a massive outdoor concert! It's a huge venue to fill, but fortunately Poppin'Party won't be the only band taking the stage during this major musical event. It's a non-stop wall of J-Pop fun as Afterglow, Pastel Palettes, Roselia, and Hello, Happy World! all join the ladies of Poppin'Party, and while they're all still competing against each other, the real winners are the lucky members of the audience!

(Source: Sentai Filmworks)
synonyms: バンドリ! フィルムライブ

node.description:
[Official Website](https://bushiroad.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kidanit)

Takaaki Kidani is a Japanese businessman. He is the founder and president of Bushiroad. Kidani has also served as the chairman of New Japan Pro-Wrestling (NJPW). He continues to be involved with NJPW through Bushiroad, in which owns the company.

He founded Bushiroad in May 2007 as a company that produces card games and assumed the position of president. The origin of the name Bushiroad comes from the failure to make Neppu Kairiku Bushi Road into a film due to various reasons when he led the project in the days of Broccoli. The film was restarted in March 2013 with Kidani as the executive producer. The company would create numerous media franchises including Tantei Opera Milky Holmes and BanG Dream!

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/MatsuuraHiroaki)

Founder and representative director of [Sanzigen](https://anilist.co/studio/537/).
Tomomi Umetsu is a Japanese director, episode director and editor.

Roselia is an all-girl band in the BanG Dream! franchise. The group consists of five members:
- [Aina Aiba](https://anilist.co/staff/126659/Aina-Aiba) (as [Yukina Minato](https://anilist.co/character/128146/Yukina-Minato)) on vocals
- [Haruka Kudo](https://anilist.co/staff/95110/Haruka-Kudou) (as [Sayo Hikawa](https://anilist.co/character/126259/Sayo-Hikawa)) on guitar
- [Megu Sakuragawa](https://anilist.co/staff/115586/Megu-Sakuragawa) (as [Ako Udagawa](https://anilist.co/character/128144/Ako-Udagawa)) on drums
- [Kanon Shizaki](https://anilist.co/staff/129512/Kanon-Shizaki) (as [Rinko Shirokane](https://anilist.co/character/128143/Rinko-Shirokane)) on keyboard
- [Yuki Nakashima](https://anilist.co/staff/128152/Yuki-Nakashima) (as [Lisa Imai](https://anilist.co/character/128147/Lisa-Imai)) on bass

[Yurika Endou](https://anilist.co/staff/118480/Yurika-Endou) was the previous bassist and voice actor for Lisa up until May 2018, when she retired from the entertainment industry and was replaced with Nakashima.
[Satomi Akesaka](https://anilist.co/staff/95723/Satomi-Akesaka) was the previous keyboardist and Rinko's VA until September 2018, when she was forced to step down after suffering sudden deafness twice, and was replaced with Shizaki. 

Roselia's band name was coined from combining the words Rose and Camellia. They debuted with the song "BLACK SHOUT".

Poppin'Party is an all-girl band in the BanG Dream! franchise. The group consists of five members:
- [Aimi](https://anilist.co/staff/109519/Aimi-Terakawa) (as [Kasumi Toyama](https://anilist.co/character/120229/)) on rhythm guitar and vocals
- [Sae Otsuka](https://anilist.co/staff/120235/) (as [Tae Hanazono](https://anilist.co/character/120232/)) on lead guitar
- [Rimi Nishimoto](https://anilist.co/staff/120234/Rimi-Nishimoto) (as [Rimi Ushigome](https://anilist.co/character/120231/)) on bass
- [Ayaka Ohashi](https://anilist.co/staff/110903/Ayaka-Ohashi) (as [Saaya Yamabuki](https://anilist.co/character/120233/)) on drums
- [Ayasa Itou](https://anilist.co/staff/118799/Ayasa-Itou) (as [Arisa Ichigaya](https://anilist.co/character/120230/)) on keyboard and tambourine

Poppin'Party first started out with Aimi, Rimi Nishimoto, and Ayasa Itou, before adding the other two members to become a full band. They debuted with the song "Yes! BanG_Dream!".

A musical group part of the BanG Dream! franchise, consisting of 5 voice actors: [Ami Maeshima](https://anilist.co/staff/128161/Ami-Maeshima) as Aya Maruyama on lead vocals, [Sumire Uesaka](https://anilist.co/staff/109441/Sumire-Uesaka) as Chisato Shirasagi, [Sawako Hata](https://anilist.co/staff/111225/Sawako-Hata) as Eve Wakamiya, [Ari Ozawa](https://anilist.co/staff/118663/Ari-Ozawa) as Hina Hikawa, and [Ikumi Nakagami](https://anilist.co/staff/112009/Ikumi-Nakagami) as Maya Yamato.

Their first single, "Shuwarin☆Drea~min", was released on July 12, 2017.

Poppin'Party is an all-girl band in the BanG Dream! franchise. The group consists of five members:
- [Aimi](https://anilist.co/staff/109519/Aimi-Terakawa) (as [Kasumi Toyama](https://anilist.co/character/120229/)) on rhythm guitar and vocals
- [Sae Otsuka](https://anilist.co/staff/120235/) (as [Tae Hanazono](https://anilist.co/character/120232/)) on lead guitar
- [Rimi Nishimoto](https://anilist.co/staff/120234/Rimi-Nishimoto) (as [Rimi Ushigome](https://anilist.co/character/120231/)) on bass
- [Ayaka Ohashi](https://anilist.co/staff/110903/Ayaka-Ohashi) (as [Saaya Yamabuki](https://anilist.co/character/120233/)) on drums
- [Ayasa Itou](https://anilist.co/staff/118799/Ayasa-Itou) (as [Arisa Ichigaya](https://anilist.co/character/120230/)) on keyboard and tambourine

Poppin'Party first started out with Aimi, Rimi Nishimoto, and Ayasa Itou, before adding the other two members to become a full band. They debuted with the song "Yes! BanG_Dream!".

A musical group part of the BanG Dream! franchise, consisting of 5 voice actors: [Ayane Sakura](https://anilist.co/staff/106622/Ayane-Sakura) as Ran Mitake on lead vocals, [Sachika Misawa](https://anilist.co/staff/102337/Sachika-Misawa) as Moca Aoba, [Emiri Katou](https://anilist.co/staff/95052/Emiri-Katou) as Himari Uehara, [Hisako Kanemoto](https://anilist.co/staff/103555/Hisako-Kanemoto) as Tsugumi Hazawa, and [Youko Hikasa](https://anilist.co/staff/102263/Youko-Hikasa) as Tomoe Udagawa.

Their first single, "That is How I Roll!", was released on September 6, 2017.

A musical group part of the BanG Dream! franchise, consisting of 5 voice actors: [Miku Itou](https://anilist.co/staff/118581/Miku-Itou) as Kokoro Tsurumaki on lead vocals, [Azusa Tadokoro](https://anilist.co/staff/112297/Azusa-Tadokoro) as Kaoru Seta, [Moe Toyota](https://anilist.co/staff/118398/Moe-Toyota) as Kanon Matsubara, [Yuri Yoshida](https://anilist.co/staff/118392/Yuri-Yoshida) as Hagumi Kitazawa, and [Tomoyo Kurosawa](https://anilist.co/staff/106661/Tomoyo-Kurosawa) as Misaki Okusawa/Michelle.

Their first single, "Egao no Orchestra!", was released on August 2, 2017.
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/uetax)

[Website](http://www.nakamurakou.com/) | [Blog](http://kou.livedoor.biz/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nkkou)

Kou Nakamura is a novelist and winner of the 39th Bungei Prize in 2002. He also won the Noma Literary Newcomer Prize in 2004.

[Official Website ](http://www.ariamusic.co.jp/) | [Twitter ](https://twitter.com/agematsu)

Noriyasu Agematsu is the founding member of the musical group Elements Garden.

Along with his fellow Elements Garden members, he is the composer and arranger for the BanG Dream! franchise, including overseeing music production for its anime.
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mim_chang)
**Iida Satoki** is a Japanese freelance sound director.

__[Profile](http://www.ariamusic.co.jp/elements-garden/fujita/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Junpei_Fujita)__

Member of the "music production brand" Elements Garden.
**Kitagawa Junko** is a Japanese color designer and digital painter.
General Manager of the animation business department at [Tokyo MX](https://anilist.co/studio/6259/).

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/安田猛_(ブシロード%29)

_Note: Not to be confused with the [photographer](https://anilist.co/staff/220867/)._

**[Twitter](https://twitter.com/akitakanori)**

**Aki Takanori (安藝貴範)** is a Japanese producer and animation planner.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ohanakoyu)

Operations Officer at Bushiroad.
Affiliated with Bushiroad.
